high_descs: Turn around and cross the room and then turn left to face the desk.
Pick the bowl up from the desk.
Go left to stand at the left side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Hold a bowl while turning a lamp on.

high_descs: take it over to the window
anns.task_desc: get a bowl and turn on a lamp

high_descs: Turn right, take one step, turn right again, take eight steps, turn left and stop in front of the dresser.
From the dresser, pick up the bowl to the right of the clock,
Turn around, take one step, take right, take six steps, turn right and stand in front of the trash can.
Still holding the bowl, stand in front of the trash can.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a bowl to hold up over a trash can
